summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3948 for the improvement of Bradford Street from a point 120 feet east of 44th Avenue South to 43rd Avenue South; and in certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, under Ordinance No. 48142 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
